dict.acceptation: 有关（方面），被牵连的；担心的，烦恼的；关心政治的，关心社会的；
涉及；关心；参与，卷入；使担忧；
有关，利害关系；顾虑；装置；

sent.orig: Call then inquiry agency is concerned upgrade matters concerned.
sent.trans: 于是就打电话询问经销商有关升级事宜。

sent.orig: The person concerned is often the one who knows the least of the matter concerned.
sent.trans: 当事都往往最不了解情况。

sent.orig: Oh Young-ming: concerned about whole strategy, and he is very concerned about our team.
sent.trans: 吴泳铭：关心整个的策略，还有他非常关心我们的团队。

sent.orig: Formal logicians are not concerned with existential matters which are precisely what artists are concerned with.
sent.trans: 形式逻辑学家并不关心存在的事物，而艺术家所关心的则正是这些东西。

sent.orig: Professor Guldan is concerned that a large proportion of urban Asian children consume an unbalanced diet.
sent.trans: 使古尔丹教授忧虑的是很大一部分亚洲城市里的孩子饮食不平衡。
